## IMiddleware.onCall() method

Hook for execution of middleware

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onCall(event: MiddlewareEvent, options?: any): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | [MiddlewareEvent](./cloudfunc.middlewareevent.md) | Event for middleware |
|  options | any | Options declared for middleware |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
